text: Ali Mohamed Bujsaim (, born September 9, 1959) is a retired football (soccer) referee from the United Arab Emirates, best known for supervising at three FIFA World Cups: 1994 (two matches), 1998 (three matches) and 2002 (two matches). ==References== * == External links == * * * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Emirati football referees Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:2002 FIFA World Cup referees Category:1998 FIFA World Cup referees Category:1994 FIFA World Cup referees Category:CONCACAF Gold Cup referees Category:Olympic football referees Category:AFC Asian Cup referees Category:Major League Soccer referees
title: Ali Bujsaim
